This is a very well tailored piece.  This material is lighter than most sweatshirts so that makes it even nicer.  The quality is superb.  The cut is a FreePeople dupe.  The size runs one size larger.  Size down one.  I love this design and do not typical like prints in sweatshirts.  Sooo good!

I love the shirt and the color, it’s very comfortable and perfect for pregnancy. I ordered it in a large size to fit through the 3rd trimester! I also love the thickness and the weight of it, it’s very soft! But the reason for only 3 stars is that this doesn’t last. I have washed it like 5-6 times now, (and specifically hung it to dry so the dryer wouldn’t wear it out or cause it to shrink) and the material is starting to look like I’ve been wearing this for years. Some pills, but mostly just looks old. Sad because I liked it so much!

评论概述: The fit was how I expected
评论详情: True this is oversized, I can still tuck in the front a little bit to add some depth to the oversized look.  The black strips have faded a little bit but doesn’t stop me from wearing it. It’s soft but thick enough not to feel like it’s see through.

I really like the Disamer Women's Crew Neck Sweatshirts Tie Dye Pullover.  It shipped well and arrived quickly without any weird smells or alarming odors. It was not wrinkled and the fit is perfect.  I am 5 foot 2 and a half inches tall, weigh 130lbs and have a 32DD bra size. I usually wear a size small or medium, and I got this in a small which fits me well. It has enough give and doesn't hug my mid-section which I really appreciate.  The color and pattern of this top are a lot of fun and the transition looks very natural. I can pair this top with a lot of different bottoms, my favorite being leggings and jeans.  I have washed this top on a normal cold cycle and it's holding up well without fading, piling, or shrinking.  Overall, I would definitely recommend this top.

The images are pretty deceiving. The cut/style is similar, but they clearly use a different (lower quality) material than what is shown. More of a thin polyester material, vs. what appears to be a thicker weathered cotton in the images. The color is not faded like the images either. I kept it, but I'm not super happy with it because it feels + looks cheap (I just wear it around the house). I really wish these amazon retailers would use their own images, rather than stealing them from other vendors. In the very least they could make a product that reflects the image in terms of color and quality :(
How can you advertise this as a sweatshirt. It is not . Its some kinda polyester. Very sad cause its pretty. Giving it to mom.

评论概述: Really super cute and comfy, but pay attention to the seams..
评论详情: I had seen some reviews, saying these shirts were either awesome or terrible.  I received the Gray with daisy design, I love it, like a light weight sweatshirt, does have the Seams Showing (this is important in quality).  Then I order 2 more designs (two-tone blue and green floral), I received them today and immediately requested a return.  NOT the same material, seams are not showing on them, and the material is a crappy clingy, slippery material and not at all like the first one.  I think the key to getting the great shirt or a horrible one is look for the seams if you want the sweatshirt feel.
Fit was ok...material was very thin..stiff and shiny..looked very cheap...this was returned

The Women's Crew Neck Sweatshirts are an absolute delight! These sweatshirts have quickly become my wardrobe staples, and they deserve a resounding five-star review for several reasons:  Classic Comfort: The crew neck style offers classic comfort that's perfect for all seasons. It's cozy and timeless. Versatile: These sweatshirts are incredibly versatile. I can dress them up or down, and they go well with various bottoms, making them suitable for any occasion. Quality Material: The fabric is soft, durable, and maintains its shape even after multiple washes. The quality is outstanding. Fit is On-Point: The fit is just right, providing a relaxed, flattering silhouette without feeling too baggy or tight. Easy to Care For: These sweatshirts are easy to maintain and clean, making them practical for everyday wear. In conclusion, the Women's Crew Neck Sweatshirts are a wardrobe must-have. They effortlessly combine comfort, style, and quality. I couldn't be more pleased with these sweatshirts, and they undoubtedly deserve a five-star rating. A definite recommendation for anyone looking for versatile, timeless, and cozy attire.

评论概述: Oversized but fabric lacks a finished quality look.

I picked the dark gray one in XL. I generally wear Large but I was opting for a very oversized look. If I got a Large, it would likely still be oversized in a good way. The fabric is soft both inside and out. If you're sensitive to tags, it's super tiny. I love how the cuffs have slits. It sits nicely on the hand. Turns out I didn't like how the color looked on me. I have salt and pepper hair. I was going to return and choose another color but my daughter liked it. She's about 6" taller than me but thinner. I'm 5' 2" and chubby. Looks great on her. I'll update with a photo.
I loved this so much!! Amazing quality! I wish I would’ve gotten a smaller size but other than that it was perfect.
Thinner material. Like the pattern. Waaay to oversized for my style.
This is a little thinner than I expected. It is made pretty good. It fits great and I like the color.

Perfect fall shirt. Feel and weight of a spirit jersey (in between long sleeve tshirt and sweatshirt) Slightly longer in the back. Is NOT fitted at the bottom it’s slightly wider than the top of the sweater. My favorite is the long cuffs with the slit. Covers majority of the back of my hand and pad of my thumb but has plenty of room to use your hands without hinderance.

It's a soft cotton-polyester blend, which is nice and doesn't feel too thick. The inside-out seams are a cute touch, and its made well.  I ordered this in my regular size, but I should've gone down one size because it is uncomfortably big, and the sleeves are very long.  I like the split cuff because it makes it easier to roll the sleeves up. It is actually nice and warm, so I think this is something I will lounge around the house in. It would be cute with a pair of leggings.

评论概述: Buyer beware if you need to return
评论详情: I actually like the sweatshirt but got one that was too small and needed to size up. The cost of postage to return to China was $28…. Not worth return obviously
Love the sweatshirt! It’s sweater weather and who doesn’t like a good old sweatshirt. I purchased it it fits perfectly and the colors are super cute!

Overall great oversized shirt. the coloring is great and very vibrant. it appears to be a printed color shirt instead of a dye colored shirt but doesn't look bad. material is thin and mostly breathable. looks good on. the slits in the front fall weird on the 2 models we tested and though it doesn't look awful it does seem to take from the overall look of the shirt. easy to laundry and no signs of fading or shrinking. seems like it may pile easily though i haven't had issues yet

评论概述: A Fall Item a bit on the large size
评论详情: The sweathshirt design and colors are fantastic. Very FALL/Winter like to enjoy in the upcoming months. The gradient of Blue to Black is very dramatic and can fit a number of colors and outfits. The fabric is a bit on the heavy side making this wear a bit uncomfortable but cozzy. The weatshirt is a bit on the larger size, meaning feels a bit big as a fit but overall for an indoor wear during the cold weather this could be the right one to snuggle on the couch or to get some work done with enough warmth to keep you going. Good for the money if you enjoy the bit over size clothing.

This sweatshirt is definitely different. It's like nothing I've worn before. The picture doesn't do it justice and here is why. The sweatshirt has two seams running down the front on each side that split at the hem and the arm cuffs. Those seams make the swearshirt really unique and flattering. It's heavy duty but not bulky. I chose the ombre colored sweatshirt because I liked the color scheme. I've recieved several compliments when wearing it. People actually want to touch it and comment on the hemline and cuffs. I never knew a sweatshirt could become a conversation focus but this one has. It's really nice and a super cool edition to my wardrobe. Definitely worth every penny spent and I plan on purchasing more in the near future.
This is a great top to pair with jeans or tights. Looks great, warm enough for cool Autumn nights. Looks great and feels great.

评论概述: Above Expectations. Generous Sizing. Thick French Terry.
评论详情: No shrinkflation here. 2xl is at least a size 20W equivalent. Soft heavy French terry looks like it will hold up for seasons. Will be an excellent winter snuggler over leggings. Exceeds my expectations

I really wish I had been paying attention when I ordered this sweatshirt. When they say oversized, they mean it. I got the medium for extra room and it was completely unnecessary. My mistake. It is, however, beautiful. I love the ombré colors. It looks great over black. It has a split hem, which is nice, and also split cuffs. I’m pretty sure I’ve never seen those before. Cute! The fabric is on the lighter side, so great for fall. If you’re looking for comfort, this is it. You’ll love it.

What I received looks like the “wish” version, compared to what the pics advertised. I ordered the grey. The “inside-out” stitching that is supposed to be subtle is very over stated. I don’t know about the other colors, but the grey runs very small. This is supposed to be an oversized sweatshirt. It is roomy in the shoulders and across the chest, but it is short. The overall look is chunky and sloppy.

It’s literally so soft I didn’t want to take it off. It does run big, I got the small and it was big and loose, but I didn’t mind it, I wore it over leggings and it still looked really cute. I picked the green color and it really is a nice shade of green. It looks more high end on than their picture. But the real takeaway is the fabric. It’s not too thick, or too thing. It really is Just Right and it’s sooo co fly and soft. Highly recommend this sweatshirt. And the other thing, if it’s for a gift and you’re not sure of the size of someone…this gives you a lot of room for error because of the way it’s cut and sized. I’m going to go check out the other colors, but the greens nice.

First of all, I recommend this. I love it.  I am a huge sweatshirt girl and this is perfect. It's not quite heavy enough to be considered a sweatshirt in my opinion. So it's like in between shirt and sweatshirt. Not sure what you call that. Maybe it is a lightweight sweatshirt. IDK. ANYWAYS. I love it. The material is on the rougher side but not in a bad way if that makes sense. It's not sooo soft, but yet it's still really nice and comfortable, even on my sensitive skin. Idk how to explain it.  The quality is great and holds up great so far. I love the look of anything flowy and comfortable so this is right up my alley. I got my usual size and it fits great. It fits oversized as is, but if you really want it oversized you can go another size up.  I can see myself wearing this all the time. I am always chilly in my house so this is a cute, lightweight shirt thing I can throw on. And the green color is so pretty. I'm really glad I got this and recommend.  For reference I am 5'5, 112 pounds wearing a small.
